summary: The Airbus A350 is a modern passenger airplane designed for long-distance flights. It was made to compete with Boeing's 787 Dreamliner. Initially, it was going to be an updated version of the A330 but was later redesigned with new materials and engines. This plane can carry up to 410 passengers and fly up to 16,500 kilometers without refueling. It's made mostly of strong, lightweight carbon fiber. The A350 entered service in 2015 and is used by many airlines worldwide.
title: Airbus A350
